column4: hey guys, im new to Linux and thinking about running a livecd, can anyone inform about the different versions of ubuntu?
Edubuntu isn't really geared towards desktop users.
but any of the others is fine, depending on what you want to look at ;)
thanks very much, i think my hardware should be fine, its a year old. I'll grab the Ubuntu disc
i dont mind throwing myself in the deep end
i heard about an ap that is similar to the Vista Aero glass, are things like that built in? or do i need to get them seperately
m_billbob: that sounds right, is that included?
i can use that as a livecd right?
yes, the Desktop CD is also an installer
